Articles.Content:
I cant personally host something like this but...

 It would be great to have a server where Shields, And salvage cannons are prohibited making resources harder to get and ship building a more rewarding process, Also players would be able to do damage with any weapon because shields aren't there to make it hard. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

It would be a very interesting way to play the game. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
